CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS conversations ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY, firstUserId BIGINT, secondUserId BIGINT, lastMessageSenderId BIGINT, statusUpdatedByUserId BIGINT, firstUserContactName VARCHAR(255), secondUserContactName VARCHAR(255), status VARCHAR(50), lastMessageDate DATE, isReadByReceiver BOOLEAN );
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS conversation_messages ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY, conversation_id UUID, senderId BIGINT, messageText VARCHAR(1000), sendDate TIMESTAMP, CONSTRAINT fk_conversation FOREIGN KEY (conversation_id) REFERENCES conversations(id) );
